content:
All: we are preparing a technical correction for R3. So far, the technical correction includes:
- correcting some XPath invariants
- removing an erroneous note about every page having comments
- correcting generated snapshots in the profiles in the specification itself
- adding a note about what italics means in a value set expansion
committers have 6 days from now to propose additional things to consider for the R3 technical correction
Should I send a patch to you for consideration?

how about fixing the section numbering here:

  • http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/request.html#compound
  • http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/event.html#compound
  • and http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/definition.html#compound
